description_a: "Robot is in font of elevator door. user is behind robot. Robot is not aligned with elevator door."

description_a: "User's hands and feet are visible. They are inside an elevator, holding remote controls."

description_a: "Robot guide-dog and user walking in a corridor approaching a bank of doors. The user stands at the robot's right, holding a handle; another person is kneeling further down the hall. No elevator or call buttons are visible in this frame, no button interactions have occurred, and the elevator state is unknown. The interaction is in the approach phase; minor safety note: robot and user's feet are close and a kneeling person ahead could require path adjustment."
description_b: "The user of the robot is guiding the robot down a corridor, he is to the right of the robot. The corridor will narrow  as the robot passes down. There is a workman crouching down in the narrow bit, he is in the way."
